features: The Original function, the Cleaning Helper - Sweeps up every shard of broken glass, liquid spills, fine dust, coffee granules, sugar, removes pet and human hairs, and easily wipes up gooey messes such as ketchup, broken eggs.
Spliced by free - Four sturdy aluminum poles, Charming hand feeling , The pole length can be adjusted from 14" - 59" you like for any cleaning job.

There is nothing more important than getting your chores done with ease - BURFERLY cleans on wide areas as well as tight corners and hard to reach places such as under beds and sofas, Whatever High terrain, Carpets, rugs, smooth floors, tile, hardwood, windows, shower walls.

Washable, Easy to maintain, Very hygienic - Unlike ordinary brooms, BURFERLY will never have dirty and unsanitary bristles. Simply rinse the smooth blades after each use to keep BURFERLY and your house clean and hygienic.

BURFERLY's Mission - Useful aesthetics, add more color to life! If you're not happy about the product, you’re covered by a full refund. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have, we are here for support and advice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the pieces didn't fit "easily" together but we got them together with a little elbow grease.but the product works GREAT !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too Small For Me
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered this broom, I didn't even notice the size of it that was listed on the product page, otherwise I wouldn't have ordered it. It is very small. It takes a lot of swipes to get any significant amount of sweeping done with it. The squeegee too, is very small. Although it does indeed do a good job on the floor as a squeegee, you still are faced with cleaning up the water or other liquid off the floor that it has squeegeed up. So, I'm not sure where it helps accomplish cleaning up the mess off the floor in the first place.This would be good for small spills and small rooms, but not for the all-around family home. I still like the little guy though, since it is really good with cleaning bathtubs and showers. That is what I am using it for now, and it works really good. I don't have to bend and reach like I normally do and the brush is wonderful at getting soap scum off.If you need something for your big floor-cleaning jobs, get something bigger, though. If not, this would be a good little tool to use, especially for all of your bathroom needs. Oh, did I mention the bathroom walls too? Brush, squeegee, wipe, and your walls are all cleaned up. Not so bad for such a little Dude.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Package for the Bathroom
reviews.reviewText: I primarily use this in the bathroom - the shower and the floor. Works good in the glass wall, and the hard-to-reach corner. Wish the brush is wider, but it's not bad for my use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Annoying Swivel While Sweeping
reviews.reviewText: As I was using the broom for the patio, the bottom of the rod kept swiveling too much which was annoying after awhile. Other than this, set up was easy. I used the squeegee head to sweep hair and crumbs off the floor, which was okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work like described.
reviews.reviewText: Well...first of all, it's chinsey. 2nd...there's absolutely no instructions what so ever. 3rd...it doesn't work at all. Doesn't scrape hair off the carpet or rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for pet hair
reviews.reviewText: This is great for sweeping pet hair or whatever else from carpet floors. My dog sheds a ton, so I use it to give the carpet a quick once over before vacuuming. I also have a large run that I can't properly vacuum, but the sweeper does a good job of keeping that tidy as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great tool to get rid of hair in the carpet! I have been using this floor sweeper for a few months now and although I don't own inside pets but I'm always finding my hair everywhere. This has help me keep my carpet clean as well as my other floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Since my GSD puppy likes to drag sticks inside and chew them on my rugs, this has seriously come in handy. It grabs and pulls all the unvacuumable bits easily so I can get them on a dustpan. Only reason for the four stars vs five is that I wish the long handle felt sturdier. It holds, but it feels bendy. And that’s a bit disconcerting.
